channel.title: Making pumpkins appear for my "holiday" time event
channel.description:
so im trying to get pumpkins to spawn along a wall...
i dont know what im doing wrong...
[code]drop = 1959 3200 3438 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3437 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3436 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3435 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3434 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3433 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3433 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3431 1 0 3 pumpkin drop = 1959 3200 3430 1 0 3 pumpkin[/code]
any help?
Greatly appreciated..

item.title: Making pumpkins appear for my "holiday" time event
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Mod Nick, post:7, topic:154964”]welll…

i dont think any drops are actualy working…

my whoel drops folder is like BLAHH

none of them are working… i think.[/quote]
Ohk, try this.
Go into the ItemHandler class (ItemHandler.java)
and go to the lines that say:
loadItemList(“item.cfg”);
//loadDrops(“drops.cfg”);

Remove the commentation marks before loadDrops. (//). Compile, it should work!

Read full topic
item.source: Making pumpkins appear for my "holiday" time event

item.title: Making pumpkins appear for my "holiday" time event

item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Most servers have their drops deriving from another source of info.
